title: Bean and rice burrito
description: This is a budget-friendly version of burrito uses tinned beans and frozen sweetcorn served with a tangy tomato relish. This is designed to be a low cost recipe.Each serving provides 733kcal, 24.5g protein, 128g carbohydrate (of which 11g sugars), 12g fat (of which 6g saturates), 13g fibre and 2.5g salt.
ingredients: 1 x 400g/14oz tin Mexican-style bean mix or mixed beans in mild chilli sauce
150g/5½oz long-grain rice, cooked according to the packet instructions
